params.owner: The address of the account which owns the tokens to be spent
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns.remaining: uint256 The number of tokens allowed to be spent

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender`  and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve)

params.amount: The number of tokens that are approved
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns.success: bool Whether or not the approval succeeded

params.owner: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.src: The address of the source account

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the current allowance from `owner` for `spender`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Gets the balance of the specified address

totalSupply().notice: Get the total number of tokens in circulation
